articles.description: There are a grand total of five endings possible in the horror indie title called Amanda the Adventurer, and players will want to see all five.
articles.content: Amanda the Adventurer is an indie game published by DreadXP. This spooky little game is fairly short, but players can get a lot of mileage out of it since there are some secrets, lots of lore, and it… [+9860 chars]
